files.patch:
@@ -360,3 +360,3 @@
-                .replaceAll("<.*?>", "")            // ignore HTML
-                .replaceAll("\\&[a-z0-9]+;?", " ")  // entities count as a single character
-                .replaceAll("\\R", "\n");           // normalize newlines
+                .replaceAll("<.*?>", "")              // ignore HTML
+                .replaceAll("&#?[A-Za-z0-9]+;", " ")  // entities count as a single character
+                .replaceAll("\\R", "\n");             // normalize newlines
